channel.description: Recent content in Workflow on Recology

item.title: My Sublime Text workflow/setup
item.description: Sublime Text is pretty great. Let’s start at the beginning. Why would my primary editing tool not be vim? My background is as a biologist, spending way to many years in grad school. My first programming language was R back in 2006; my first text editor about the same year was Notepad++; my first interaction with the cli was probably a year later or so (but that was on Windows).
